item.description:
OUTING ANNOUNCEMENT

WHERE: Winchester, MA common

WHEN: 3 hours starting at the posted time

THE SCENE: The Winchester Artists Network hosts an art fair every year outdoors. At the event is artwork for sale, demonstrations for children a large scale acrylics piece that is sold to patrons by the inch, etc. At this, we will be painting, and open to the general populace for conversation as well as questions they may have about what it's like to do art. We, in other words, are the "live artists" exhibit.

WHERE TO MEET*: At the posted time, with 1/2 hour leeway for late-comers. Let's meet in Winchester Common.

DIRECTIONS: From 93 Take Fellsway West/Winchester exit. Follow the rotary until you see a sign for South Border road. Take that right and continue absoltuely straight 3 miles until you reach the center.

OTHER:
RSVPs: It's best to let us know you are coming so we can look for you or alert you to any changes.
THINGS TO BRING WHICH ARE OFTEN FORGOTTEN:
Mosquito repellant, Paper towels, Sweater, water, foodIF LOST: If you become lost getting there, call.
*LAX: We meet at the time above. You have 30 minutes additional slack, after which we may leave to the painting site without you.
INCLEMENT WEATHER: It is up to you to determine if the weather makes painting untenable. Although, I will try to leave a message on my voice mail if I myself do not intend to be there.

Michael Emerald
617/968-0627
westpointusma@yahoo.com
item.name: ART EVENT: Winchester's "Art In The Park"
